title: Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) Competency Strengthening Program for Pre-Service Teachers (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Educational Theory and Classroom Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Requires a structure enabling pre-service teachers (role-playing as general citizens) to autonomously plan and execute learning. Supports blended learning environments using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulated learning (SRL) strategies (goal setting, self-assessment, resource management) contextually with over 80% accuracy.
Through learning journal analysis, learners can recognize their learning patterns and propose improvement strategies in over 70% of cases.
Based on peer feedback and self-reflection, learners demonstrate over 20% improvement in instructional design capabilities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
